description:
How to Strike Up Conversations with Women and Enjoy Doing It [Guide to Meeting New People]

In the course you will learn how to start conversations with women, what to say and how to say it so that it looks natural, is socially acceptable, and will get a positive response from the women whom you approach.

You will also learn the right way to carry on the conversation you started in order to eventually get her phone number, after which you will learn how to exit that conversation gracefully.
title: How to Strike Up Conversations with Women and Enjoy Doing it
